interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Natural Honey,Ultra Hydrating and Exfoliating Scrub for Nourishing Essential Body Care - 12.3 oz
Review Date: 2019/10/04
Store: Natural Solution
Product Description: ['Formulated using unique and natural ingredients of Himalayan Pink Salt and honey. The abrasive material like salt, sugar, rice bran, jojoba beads that rubs away the dead skin cells on the surface, revealing the softer, younger cells. Carefully hand blended with organic essential oils, skin smoothing enhancers and the undeniable exfoliating power of pure, fine grain Dead Sea Salts. Nothing artificial, no chemicals.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Natural Solution', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing, Nourishing, Cleansing', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246A', 'UPC': '818581019805', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Review Text: This scrub smells good. It's a very warm, comforting scent. I used this scrub in the shower after I shaved to exfoliate my legs and loved how it left my legs feeling. It's also really hydrating, so I didn't feel like I needed to immediately slather on lotion...
Review Title: Great scrub!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user continues to favor skincare and makeup products that focus on matting and shine control for combination skin. Their recent exploration into body care, notably with a hydrating scrub, signals an expanding interest in comprehensive personal care routines.

- **Performance Focus:** The user appreciates products that deliver a non-greasy feel and a natural finish. Their recent review of a body scrub highlights their enjoyment of effective and nourishing formulations, reinforcing their desire for convenience and quality.

- **Quality Expectation:** A notable increase in their average product rating, now reflecting strong satisfaction, indicates that the user is increasingly enthusiastic about high-performing products that meet their evolving needs.

- **Brand Openness:** The user maintains an openness to trying varied brands, including those that offer natural ingredients, as they continue to search for practical solutions across different categories.

- **Review Engagement:** The user remains actively engaged in writing product reviews, showcasing a desire to share experiences and guide others. Their reviews underline an ongoing appreciation for products that offer comfort, effectiveness, and hydration.

- **Overall Trends:** The user’s trend towards holistic beauty care is apparent, as they seek out practical and effective solutions that enhance their skincare, nail care, and now body care routines, always preferring non-greasy, nourishing products.
